medical_history.chief_complaint: Short stature diagnosed as isolated growth hormone deficiency (IGHD II).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Growth retardation became evident at the age of 5 years and 3 months, and IGHD was diagnosed at the age of 6 years.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Familial isolated growth hormone deficiency (IGHD II); mutation in GH-1 gene (GH-E32A).
medical_history.family_history: Both patient and his brother are affected by IGHD II; family history indicates an autosomal dominant inheritance pattern.
